welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tel Aviv-Yafo, where the vibrant city meets the serene coastline. Get ready to experience the city's unique blend of modern culture, historic charm, and beautiful beaches. Enjoy your time exploring all that this dynamic city has to offer!

restaurants.name: Pizza Artzieli (פיצה ארציאלי)
restaurants.description: Pizza Artzieli (פיצה ארציאלי) is a pizzeria located in תל אביב-יפו.

restaurants.name: גרציאני מעדנים ולחם
restaurants.description: גרציאני מעדנים ולחם is a deli located in the city.

restaurants.name: Meat Bar (מיט בר)
restaurants.description: Meat Bar (מיט בר) is a steakhouse located in תל אביב-יפו.

restaurants.name: Hakosem Falafel (פלאפל הקוסם)
restaurants.description: Hakosem Falafel (פלאפל הקוסם) is a falafel restaurant located in תל אביב.

restaurants.name: Vitrina
restaurants.description: Vitrina is a burger joint located in תל אביב-יפו.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves low-cost and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The main terminal of Ben Gurion International Airport, serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
